EmailTemplate.description: Added after go-live to differentiate from First Defect Notice
EmailTemplate.name: Final Rejection Notice EWP NINTEX
EmailTemplate.subject: Rejection Notice: Permit Application# {!Rejection__c.Registration_Number__c} for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To {!Rejection__c.Applicant__c}:
Your Permit application for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} has been rejected for not meeting all of the application requirements. Please review the attached Rejection Notice, which lists the incomplete requirements and provides information on how you can continue the application process.
https://cadir.my.site.com/registrations
Sincerely,
Entertainment Work Permit Unit Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California Phone: (818) 901-5484
